p: For humans, the estimated DEHP dose of daily exposure ranges from 3 to 30 μg/kg body weight 7. In the current study, DEHP was purchased from Sigma (Sigma-Aldrich, 36735-1G, Shanghai, China), the stock solution of which was prepared in DMSO. Before oral gavage, the working solution was diluted with sterile water. Regarding DEHP dose, 40 μg/kg body weight daily was adopted in this study, following reference to many in vivo publications 21, 51, 69 and previous papers 30, 34, 35.
